title: Trailblazers: Twenty Amazing Western Women
description: From Sacagawea to Dorothea Lange to Sandra Day O'Connor, these twenty remarkable women followed their dreams, challenged convention, and created new opportunities for American Womenâ€•yesterday and today. Organized chronologically from 1805 to the present, this inspirational book includes women from a variety of racial, religious, professional, and call background.
author: Karen Surina Mulford
